funFacts.title: Early Days of Pig Latin
funFacts.content: Did you know Pig Latin, or 'Hog Latin,' first popped up in an 1895 newspaper? I find it hilarious that what started as a quirky term became a playful secret code kids adore today. VibeTrans makes it even more fun to explore!

funFacts.title: Secret Codes and Pig Latin
funFacts.content: In the T9 texting era, teens cleverly used Pig Latin to dodge parental oversight. Imagine sending a secret message like 'ixnay on the olitics-pay.' I think that's pretty ingenious! VibeTrans helps keep this playful tradition alive with ease.

items.title: Master Pig Latin Quickly
items.content: Ever wanted to speak Pig Latin fluently? With VibeTrans, you can practice daily to master this quirky language. I believe it's a fun way to sharpen your English pronunciation skills. Plus, playing with words like 'apple' becoming 'appleyay' is just a blast!

items.title: Translate Large Documents
items.content: Got a big document to convert? VibeTrans has you covered. You can upload whole files, like novels or scripts, and translate them instantly. I think this feature is a game-changer, especially for teachers or language enthusiasts dealing with large texts.

items.title: Handling Names and Punctuation
items.content: Ever wondered how to translate 'Michael Jordan' or handle punctuation in Pig Latin? VibeTrans smartly retains names and punctuation. I love how it keeps 'Hello, world!' intact. It's nifty for keeping your sentences clear while having fun with the language.

items.title: Audio Learning with Pig Latin
items.content: Want to hear Pig Latin read aloud? VibeTrans offers a text-to-speech feature that helps you grasp the pronunciation. I think it's fantastic for auditory learners. Hearing phrases like 'ellohay' spoken out loud can make learning more engaging and effective.
